name: Channel 301
description:
Channel 301 It's an action/puzzle game  that allows you to see different ways of solving problems embodied in a fun mechanic in which the combination of your mechanical ability and your intelligence will allow you to solve your problems.

Lima Game Jam 2022!

Programming:

Diego Johnson - elbiguel <- Lead Programmer!

Braulio Baldeon - WankerSloth <- Technical Artist

Game Design:

Pablo Betancourt - Phi ro <- Game Designer

Music:

Roberto Ángeles - Cytestake  <- Musician

Art and Animation:

Cristopher Vargas - Chrivart <- Pixel Art Artist

Angela Sakuray  - Sak <- Narrative and Animation
